channel.title: Cheryl Strayed on Yep. this is my 'Other blog'
channel.description: Recent content in Cheryl Strayed on Yep. this is my 'Other blog'

item.title: TinyBeautifulThings
item.description: Tiny Beautiful Things - Cheryl Strayed Because we are all, in the private kingdom of our hearts, desperate for the company of a wise, true friend. Someone who isn’t embarrassed by our emotions, or her own, who recognizes that life is short and that all we have to offer, in the end, is love. When I was done writing it, I understood that things happened just as they were meant to.
